instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: MB pro 820-3332-a , black screen , fan spins crazy .
threads.message:
Hi all , i have a problem with me macbook pro retina 820-3332-a , it turns on and give sound only by holding the power button and then plug the charger in , black screen , fans spins high even low temp . charger looks good from green to orange . 

if it's possible to give me the steps to diagnose would help me really 

thanks,

threads.title: MB pro 820-3332-a , black screen , fan spins crazy .
threads.message:
do you get a green light on the charger? if so start checking your power rail.
if not.  Check the pp3v42 rail

threads.title: MB pro 820-3332-a , black screen , fan spins crazy .
threads.message: Yes green then orange , but when i plug the charger in the mac don;t start up it self i need to hold the power button for 6 7 sec and it starts.

threads.title: MB pro 820-3332-a , black screen , fan spins crazy .
threads.message:
Looks like it only starts in SMC bypass.
Post exact resistance between pins 17/18 and 27/28 of U7000.

Any history available, liquid signs?

threads.title: MB pro 820-3332-a , black screen , fan spins crazy .
threads.message:
No Sir , no liquid , 4 years ago i it just turn the screen black and leaves it in the box ,cuz i thought it is the GPU , so i tried heating a little wih a hair dryer and it turns on for a bit and than again now i want really to know whats te problem just im into learning microsoldering big thanks to louis who insipred me for that. 

So , when i press the power button  and put the charger in by holding the pw button it starts to run and make the welcome sound but also the fans starts to run really fast i dont see any damge on the board . 

So pin 17/18 resistance is 03.90 pin 27/28 is 21.17 . 

what dose this mean ?

threads.title: MB pro 820-3332-a , black screen , fan spins crazy .
threads.message:
Please reply with new post, not a comment.

Fan runs at max when start in SMC bypass, is normal.

Do you have original 85W charger?

Check if PM_BATLOW_L is high level.
ALso check if AVREF_SMC voltage is present.
Post voltages for SMC_DCIN_VSENSE, SMC_PBUS_VSENSE, SMC_DCIN_ISENSE, SMC_CHGR_BMON_ISENSE.

threads.title: MB pro 820-3332-a , black screen , fan spins crazy .
threads.message: i'm powering the mac with a power supply ? right now i dont have a charger !

threads.title: MB pro 820-3332-a , black screen , fan spins crazy .
threads.message: Did you use 85W cable?

threads.title: MB pro 820-3332-a , black screen , fan spins crazy .
threads.message: im not sure  !! but with that it turnet ON by smc bypass ? not  u f**k up the u700 just wantet to resolder now i get a short get really hot !!

threads.title: MB pro 820-3332-a , black screen , fan spins crazy .
threads.message:
Did you connect power supply direct to the board?
Did not use Magsafe cable???

threads.title: MB pro 820-3332-a , black screen , fan spins crazy .
threads.message: yes im using a megasafe head cable but i idk if the head is 65w or 85w !

threads.title: MB pro 820-3332-a , black screen , fan spins crazy .
threads.message:
Connect to an working machine and check power in system report.
15" will NOT start with 60W charger; unless the battery is connected and has some charge on it.

threads.title: MB pro 820-3332-a , black screen , fan spins crazy .
threads.message: i toke out the chip and the charger light is fine , when i put it on it get shortet ? is smth wrong with the u700 chip ? also check email .

threads.title: MB pro 820-3332-a , black screen , fan spins crazy .
threads.message:
You will get light even with 45W cable.
But machine doesn't start without 85W charger, if no battery (charged) present...

threads.title: MB pro 820-3332-a , black screen , fan spins crazy .
threads.message: I?m using a power supply ? Is that a problem ? Idk what watt is the head of the charger should i get a 85w head ? And before i took the U7000 the mac startup fine in bypass mode just the fans spins fast and the battery was not recognized ? What are the diagnosing steps now ?

threads.title: MB pro 820-3332-a , black screen , fan spins crazy .
threads.message:
That is normal behaviour for SMC bypass.
You should check AVREF_SMC voltage first.
If OK, need to check SMC sensors level.
And yes, head cable must be 85W...

threads.title: MB pro 820-3332-a , black screen , fan spins crazy .
threads.message: I accidentally touched C7016 with C7002 with the prob by measuring the voltage ! now i dont have pp3v42 ? can't find the burning cap ? replaced u6900 , u6901 still now power ?

threads.title: MB pro 820-3332-a , black screen , fan spins crazy .
threads.message: Replace U7000...

threads.title: MB pro 820-3332-a , black screen , fan spins crazy .
threads.message: I took the u7000 off ? last time it was not connected and still got the 3v42 volt ? should i check smth else ?

threads.title: MB pro 820-3332-a , black screen , fan spins crazy .
threads.message:
So no 3V42 at all now?
Diode mode reading?
U6990 voltages?

threads.title: MB pro 820-3332-a , black screen , fan spins crazy .
threads.message:
No nowhere ! 100mv voltage 
Diode mode 00.33 somwhere 600.00 somewhere 00.80 
U6990 :
pin 2 104mv
pin 3 1v
pin 4 250mv
pin 5 700mv
pin 6 17.45v

and for diode mode where exactly to touch ? soory im new in this ,thats why this dumb questions .

threads.title: MB pro 820-3332-a , black screen , fan spins crazy .
threads.message:
You must check diode mode at L6995; usually aprox 0.300, red probe at ground.
If big difference, lift one pin and see where the lower value remains.

threads.title: MB pro 820-3332-a , black screen , fan spins crazy .
threads.message: I?m getting a shortt on Q7035 replaced it 3 times still gets really hot ? Where to check !

threads.title: MB pro 820-3332-a , black screen , fan spins crazy .
threads.message:
So you change and power up the board directly?
No previous measures in diode mode???

Post diode mode at L7030 and check Q7030 for short.

threads.title: MB pro 820-3332-a , black screen , fan spins crazy .
threads.message:
L6695 = right pin 0.333 , left pin 0.000 
L7030 = both sides 0.450 
Q7030 is shorted i think. i removed it .
where to check now ? or to inject voltage to find the short ?

threads.title: MB pro 820-3332-a , black screen , fan spins crazy .
threads.message:
"L6695 = right pin 0.333 , left pin 0.000"
No way to know how you look at the board; you may look in schematic, or boardview in different way.
That coil has pins 1 and 2 marked on the schematic; please post accurate infoormation.
I suppose you got different ohm values because coil is lifted...

"Q7030 is shorted i think. i removed it ."
Why don't measure it, once removed?

threads.title: MB pro 820-3332-a , black screen , fan spins crazy .
threads.message: On L6695 pin2 = 0.000 pin1 = 0.325 those values are with lifted coil . should i put U7000 and then check for short i can i do it without ?

threads.title: MB pro 820-3332-a , black screen , fan spins crazy .
threads.message:
You have short on 3V42_G3H rail.
ISL6259 and SMC are suspect, but more chips are connected there.
You can try to inject voltage (carefully)...

threads.title: MB pro 820-3332-a , black screen , fan spins crazy .
threads.message: I have this broken srew hole broken ? Can this make the short ?

threads.title: MB pro 820-3332-a , black screen , fan spins crazy .
threads.message: The SMC is going hot !!

threads.title: MB pro 820-3332-a , black screen , fan spins crazy .
threads.message:
I removed the SMC , U2600 , U5750 , U4650 , all of them got hot , now on diode mode on L6995 pin2 = 0.433 , pin1 = 0.333 ? now what to do ? reball smc ? 
?

threads.title: MB pro 820-3332-a , black screen , fan spins crazy .
threads.message: If that screw holes is busted, you're going to have other issues once you fix the power issue just forewarning you...

threads.title: MB pro 820-3332-a , black screen , fan spins crazy .
threads.message: I'm getting 18.06v on pp3v42 ?

threads.title: MB pro 820-3332-a , black screen , fan spins crazy .
threads.message: If that?s actually true, this going to be a waste of time. Every single component on PP3v42 is now dead

threads.title: MB pro 820-3332-a , black screen , fan spins crazy .
threads.message: Trash it or replace pp3v42 components ? Have a lot of donor boards .
